snippet: The University of Texas at Austin and North Dakota State University in Fargo, N.D., had ordered campus evacuations on Friday morning.
lead_paragraph: The University of Texas at Austin and North Dakota State University in Fargo, N.D., had ordered campus evacuations on Friday morning.

headline.seo: No Explosives Found After Bomb Threats at Colleges
headline.main: No Explosives Found After Bomb Threats at Colleges
